author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip | Pics: Zooey Deschanel makes first red carpet appearance since becoming a mum three months ago
text:
Not only did she reveal an amazingly sparkly Lela Rose number on the red carpet, the 35-year-old also revealed the name of her 3-month-old daughter. And it's suitably quirky.
Speaking at last night's red carpet premiere for Rock The Kasbah in New York, the New Girl actress divulged her daughter's name - Elsie Otter. "Otter as in the animal." In case we were in any doubt.
For those here for the fashion as opposed to baby names, Lela Rose - which has been toted by celebs such as Nina Dobrev, Jessica Alba, Selena Gomez, Lauren Conrad, and Mandy Moore - has whetted our appetite for the festive season. BRING ON THE SPPEEAAAAKRKLE!
Also rocking the red carpet last night, we had Lady Gaga and Taylor Kinney, Kate Hudson, and a very interesting skirt...?
